title: Short-Term Intensive Practical English Course for Graduate Students

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic English grammar and reading comprehension
context.additional_context: Program focused on improving academic/professional English proficiency for non-humanities graduate students. Designed with accessibility in mind for limited-technology environments centered on smartphones

learning_goals: Summarize academic papers and create presentation materials in English.
Confidently deliver English academic presentations related to the major (mathematics).
Engage in Q&A sessions using specialized terminology at international academic conferences.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
